channel.title: Microsoft 365 on BrianMakes
channel.description: Recent content in Microsoft 365 on BrianMakes

item.title: Migrating Email to Microsoft 365
item.description: Study Guide - Migrating Email to Microsoft 365 When I was studying to complete my MCSA: Office 365 in 2018, I struggled a bit keeping the multiple migration options straight. I needed to work through the material again anyway, maybe my notes will help others that are studying. I worked through the Exchange Online Docs and made a few notes. Migration Types Most of the study material for MS-100 talks about four primary migration methods: Staged, Cutover, Hybrid and IMAP.

item.title: MS-900 Things I would normally look up
item.description: Why did I decided to take MS-900 Microsoft 365 Fundamentals Introduction Microsoft moved to Role-Based Certifications, and I was slow to adapt. In 2018 I passed the exams for the MCSA: Office 365 and MCSE: Productivity. The current global pandemic left me stuck at home and in need of distraction. I decided this was the year to bring my Microsoft Certifications up to date. So, while Microsoft 365 Fundamentals is not a prerequisite for the Enterprise Administrator Expert certification, I decided to take it anyway.
